children.value: This example returns all filters in zone with ID
This example returns the filter with ID

---
header: Response
---
{
  "result": {
    "id": "<FILTER_ID>",
    "paused": false,
    "description": "Login from office",
    "expression": "ip.src eq 93.184.216.0 and (http.request.uri.path ~ \"^.*/wp-login.php$\" or http.request.uri.path ~ \"^.*/xmlrpc.php$\")"
  },
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": []
}
